parameter.help: If true then was created *.kt files else *.java

parameter.help: If true, then in res/layout was created ${layoutName}

parameter.help: If true, this activity will have a CATEGORY_LAUNCHER intent filter, making it visible in the launcher

parameter.name: Portrait Orientation
parameter.help: If true, this activity will have a android:screenOrientation='portrait'

parameter.help: If true, then was created Presenter and View public class.If false, then was package
